author: Fiona Denton
description:
I’ll admit it: I judged a book by its cover. I saw a giant flaming figure towering over a smaller warrior and thought, “Oh wow, that looks cool,” and decided M. H. Ayinde’s debut novel, A Song of Legends Lost, would be a good read. Luckily for me, this snap judgement proved to be correct; […]

The post REVIEW: A Song of Legends Lost by M. H. Ayinde appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: A Song of Legends Lost by M. H. Ayinde
